text.__SUMMARY__: Erica multiflora is a species of flowering plant (angiosperms) in the heather family, Ericaceae. It is native to the Mediterranean Basin.
text.See also:
Mediterranean forests, woodlands, and scrub
Index: Flora of the Mediterranean
text.External links: Dressler, S.; Schmidt, M. & Zizka, G. (2014). "Erica multiflora". African plants – a Photo Guide. Frankfurt/Main: Forschungsinstitut Senckenberg.
